content.question: Based on the arguments in the passage, which of the following developments most likely influenced the ideas of the author?

choices.label: Feminist movements and changing gender norms
Rights-based movements about ethnicity, class, and religion
International and transnational movements for peace and security

content.answer: Rights-based movements about ethnicity, class, and religion

topic.text: 9.5: Calls for Reform and Responses after 1900

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
